# Gotham Independent Film Award for Best Original Screenplay

The Gotham Independent Film Award for Best Original Screenplay is one of the annual Gotham Independent Film Awards. It started being presented in 2025 and replaced the Gotham Independent Film Award for Best Screenplay category.
